name: Verecloud
overview:
Cloudwrangler™ is the cloud app store for small and medium businesses.

With Cloudwrangler, businesses can find all the cloud services they need from one source, with one contract, one monthly invoice and one contact for technical support. And Cloudwrangler allows SMBs to monitor all their cloud services, licenses and users from one dashboard.

Cloudwrangler is built and operated by Verecloud, Inc. Based in Denver, Colorado, Verecloud, Inc. is an innovative technology company that connects and integrates cloud service suppliers to small and medium size businesses (SMBs) through multiple distribution channels.

Verecloud’s mission is to become the industry leader in cloud service brokerage by creating a value chain with the following benefits:

SMBs can more efficiently operate their businesses by expanding and aggregating their cloud services through one portal.

Cloud service suppliers can expand their reach and strengthen their product offerings through Cloudwrangler’s powerful integration and billing capabilities.

Cloudwrangler™ bridges the current gap between (i) small and medium businesses that want expanded and integrated services via the Cloud, (ii) communications service providers (CSPs) and managed service suppliers (MSPs) who need innovative, high-margin services to drive growth, and (iii) innovative clouding computing solution suppliers who want access to the large distribution channels that have developed.
